text: Why is the only thing I can think about when I see this is that Jesus had a hot bod

Lovely, it’s okay to relapse. It happens. Life is like that- every time we think we are “healed” the scab rips open and shows us there is still work to be done. Until it doesn’t. Sounds like you still have work to do- that’s okay. Life is a journey, thank goodness. You have lots of time to get it right. Please, be easy on yourself. Sending you so much love. X
